Title: Faster
Overview: After 10 years in prison, Driver is now a free man with a single focus - hunting down the people responsible for brutally murdering his brother.
production_companies: Castle Rock Entertainment, TriStar Pictures, State Street Pictures, CBS Films
Cast: Dwayne Johnson, Billy Bob Thornton, Maggie Grace
